items.title: Greens politician Kat McNamara quits NT parliament 18 months after historic Nightcliff win
items.summary: Kat McNamara is leaving the role effectively immediately due to "ongoing health challenges". It comes 18 months after she became the first Greens candidate to win a seat in NT parliament.

items.title: Thailand PM Anutin Charnvirakul confident of forming government after election
